fixed_intent.description: Indie founder/small SaaS team wants to try an AI tool to solve their problem
fixed_intent.primary_goal: Try the AI tool and see if it delivers value for their use case
fixed_intent.expected_reward: Working AI tool that solves their problem or demonstrates value
typical_exit_triggers: Too much setup before trying the tool
Asking for payment before seeing value
Tool doesn't work or is too complex
fixed_intent.expected_completion_behavior: Tries the tool quickly, sees value, then decides to continue or not
